title: 2010 Vikings rank as Lehigh Valley's best football team of PIAA era
body: Central Catholic’s perfect journey through the 2010 season lands it at No. 1 on The Morning Call’s list of top football teams from the PIAA playoffs era. The Vikings went 16-0 and beat three undefeated teams.

title: Boyle scores 38 as Notre Dame boys basketball books trip to district final
body: Sophomore Brendan Boyle connected on 14 of his 26 field goals to push the Crusaders into the title game.

title: Northampton boys basketball stuns Liberty in D-11 playoffs, clinches state spot
body: Donte Rodriguez scored a game-high 19 points and No. 7 seed Northampton closed the game with a 9-3 spurt as it stunned No. 2 Liberty 52-44 at Easton Area Middle School.

title: Stefanik’s versatility key to Nazareth’s upset chances vs. St. Joe’s Prep
body: Nathan Stefanik has done it all for Nazareth during one of the best football seasons in program history.

title: Defense is a family affair for Freedom football’s Moores
body: Defensive coordinator Greg Moore has loved the chance to coach two of his seven sons, Kaden and Braelin, in 2019.

title: Freedom football rides record night from QB Jared Jenkins to rout of Emmaus
body: Jared Jenkins fired as many touchdown passes (4) as incompletions as the Patriots dismantled the Green Hornets.
